module.p:
Corpus examples –
Tha An Comunn Gaidhealach a’ bruidhinn air Seanaileir ùr a thaghadh a bhios os cionn obair a’ Chomuinn. [...] Bhiodh a leòr aige ri dhèanamh an toiseach ag ath-nuadhachadh dreach a’ Chomuinn. [...] Ach dh’ fheumadh am Fear-stiùiridh ùr barrachd air a sin a dhèanamh. Dh’ fheumadh e siubhal a dhèanamh eadar Rubha Robhanais agus Ceann Bharraidh, eadar am Parbh is Maol Chinn-tìre, agus cha deanadh math dha dìochuimhneachadh gu robh obair a’ Chomuinn a’ buntainn ri Coimisean nan Croitearan an Inbhirnis, ri Roinn an Fhoghluim an Dùn-Eideann, agus ri Tigh nan Cumantan an Lunnainn.
The Highland Society is talking about choosing a new General who will oversee the Society’s work. [...] He would have enough to do initially reforming the Society. [...] But the new leader would have to do more than (just) that. He would have to travel between the Butt of Lewis and Barra Head, between Cape Wrath and the Mull of Kintyre, and he should not forget that the Society’s work is related to the Crofters’ Commission in Inverness, to the Education Department in Edinburgh, and to the House of Commons in London. td. 105, ‘Air an Spiris’
